response-profile-capability.description: Period of updating the data inside this application
Represents the first entry in the list of releases
List of release numbers and changes

integer-profile-capability.purpose: Time interval between cycles of serially updating the OperationKeys
Creating a Link in ALT was successful if an OperationKey could be received. This attribute limits waiting for the OperationKey to be received.

http-server-interface-capability.application-purpose: Keeps the operation keys on server and client side in synch.
